adDetails: chess tutor offering lessons Experienced chess tutor offering chess lessons, either private or group lessons. Achieved FIDE master ranking and a rating of 2400. Represented Canada at World Under 16 and World Junior Chess Championships. Defeated a GrandMaster at World Open in Philadelphia many years ago. Currently retired from active competition but have experience tutoring chess to kids and adults. Check link below and Google my name and chess to see credentials. Adam show contact info http://chess.ca/littke-adam
